title: Why I Bought A South Korea ETF Today
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: South Korean stocks are a bargain, but the question is: How long do we need to wait for concrete confirmation of genuine progress in the peace process on the Korean peninsula? The market makes no announcements when reaching a bottom. If we wait until South Korean construction companies are paving the foundation for a new Riviera on the Sea of Japan, we’ve waited too long. Yet actions on the part of North Korea suggest the peace train has left the station. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
